idea-plugin.name: Git Commit Template
idea-plugin.description:
Create a commit message with the following template:

        <type>(<scope>): <subject>
        <BLANK LINE>
        <body>
        <BLANK LINE>
        <footer>

我很喜欢使用这个提交模板插件，但原始项目已经停止维护了，于是我clone下来并做了修改，欢迎使用！

I really like using this submission template plug-in, but the original project has stopped being maintained, so I cloned it and made modifications. Welcome to use it!
